intervention_catalogue.name: Pathways to Change
intervention_catalogue.short_description: This toolkit is aimed at women convicted of sexual offences.
long_description: This toolkit is aimed at women convicted of sexual offences.

It is gender-specific and trauma-informed, supported by strengths-based approaches and the biopsychosocial model. It is designed to be delivered flexibly to best address the needs of the woman on probation.
intervention_catalogue.session_detail: Parts 2 to 5 of this 6-part toolkit are optional. Parts 1 and 6 need to be completed.
